comments: The description of the bug is almost same as in bug 190009 except that it happens in Wtp 154 and we need a separate bug for pmc approval

Created an attachment (id=72892)
wtp 155 patch that prevents the Unsupported..Exc

patch for wtp 155

Steps To Reproduce:
In a product based on WTP 155

1. Create a Enterprise application project of j2ee version 1.4
2. Now create an application client project (do not choose to add to ear) make
sure version is 1.4.
3. Now right click on ear project , properties-J2ee module dependencies. CHECK
the app client project. Hit ok.
4. Now right click on ear project , properties-J2ee module dependencies.
UNCHECK the app client project. 
5. Click on the Add library buttons and choose some library. Hit ok in that dialog. 
6. Hit ok in the property page.
Get exception 

java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
